Who are we

LET'S START AT THE BEGINNING

Over thirty years ago, Richard (Rick) Hulme and Daryl Evans took a cross-country motorcycle trip that would change their path for years to come.
They both spent their days honing their crafts. Daryl, the engineer and builder behind innovative designs. Rick, the artist, and creator of high-end finishes.
Together, they crafted a company that still thrives thirty-six years later.

Get to know our team

Rick Hulme

CEO

Rick is the operational wizard behind our seamless processes. With a background in Industrial Design from the University of Alberta, and hands-on experience with local craftsmen, Rick ensures our designs are not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical.

Daryl Evans

Carpenter

Daryl is a master of the carpentry trade. Trained at the Northern Alberta Institute of Technology and brings over 36 years of experience to his role. Daryl's expertise is shown in the quality of our products.

Stephanie Liverani

Lead Designer

Stephanie is the creative powerhouse of our design team. With a keen eye for contemporary aesthetics and a practical approach to functionality, she has a Bachelor's degree in Design from MacEwan University and a portfolio that spans a diverse range of styles.

Jakob Owens

Carpenter

Jakob brings a fresh perspective and an infectious energy to every project. With a knack for precision and a commitment to the craft, Jakob is quickly making his mark in the industry. His dedication to learning and his ability to adapt to new techniques make him a valuable asset to our team.

Lets talk business
